title: Add colored boxes and species badge to patient card

requirements.text: Add a colored box border around the notes field in the patient card and make the notes field always visible (not collapsible) so it stands out more

quotes: put a color box around notes field and make the field always visible so it stands out more

acceptanceCriteria: Notes field has a visible colored border
Notes field is always expanded and visible on the patient card
Notes field is visually distinct from other fields

requirements.text: Add a purple colored box border around the Histo (histopathology) task in the patient card task checklist

quotes: Purple box around the Histo task

acceptanceCriteria: Histo task has a purple border when displayed in the patient card
Purple color is clearly distinguishable from other task colors

requirements.text: Add a blue colored box border around the Imaging task in the patient card task checklist

quotes: Blue box around the Imaging task

acceptanceCriteria: Imaging task has a blue border when displayed in the patient card
Blue color is clearly distinguishable from other task colors

requirements.text: Add an orange colored box border around the presenting complaint field in the patient card
acceptanceCriteria: Presenting complaint field has an orange border
Orange color is clearly distinguishable from other field colors

requirements.text: Add the species information displayed in a rounded box badge below the medical record number field in the patient card

quotes: add species in rounded box below medical record number

acceptanceCriteria: Species is displayed in a rounded badge-style box
Species badge appears directly below the medical record number
Badge has rounded corners and stands out visually

constraints: Do not modify the CaseCard component's data structure or props
Keep all other patient card fields and layout intact
nonGoals: Modifying task types or checklist items
Altering the color scheme of other UI components
Changing the overall layout structure of the patient card
